title: Growth in the Western Balkans Holds Firm Amid Global Uncertainty
description: VIENNA, April 28, 2025 – Economic growth in the Western Balkans is projected to slow down modestly in 2025 owing to weaker external demand and economic uncertainty arising from evolving global trade policies which could affect business and consumer confidence, according to the Western Balkans Regula...

title: Trump’s New Tariffs and Their Impact on Albania and the Western Balkans
